sections.name: Fundamentals of Light and Reflection
sections.description: This section tests your basic understanding of how light behaves, particularly the laws of reflection and properties of light rays. This knowledge is fundamental to understanding reflection on any surface, plane or curved.

sections.name: Plane Mirrors and Image Formation
